code: import{io}from"socket.io-client";import{getNotifications}from"../../actions/notificationActions";export var connection=function connection(){var socket=io("ws://localhost:4001");return socket;};export var receiver=function receiver(dispatch){var ws=connection();ws.on("data",function(arg){if(arg){if(arg.userToken.includes(localStorage.getItem("username"))){dispatch(getNotifications());}}});};export var emitter=function emitter(userToken){var ws=connection();ws.emit("client",{userToken:userToken});};
